title: UTF-8 encoding errors during fetch
description: 12 URLs fail with 'Invalid response encoding: Invalid UTF-8' across hostthetoast.com (6 URLs) and asweetpeachef.com (6 URLs). The fetcher rejects non-UTF-8 responses instead of detecting charset from the Content-Type header or <meta charset> tags and transcoding. These are real recipe pages that would otherwise extract fine.
